oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Davy Crockett portrait
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Full-length portrait of Davy Crockett (1786-1836). He wears woodsmen clothing with fringe at the collar and coat bottom, and boots. A pouch and knife are at his waist. He carries a rifle and a raccoon cap. The background is wooded. He stands in front of a tree. On the lower left-side, "Tennessee" is written in dots.
Pioneer and U.S. Congressman from Tennessee, 1827-1831, 1833-1835.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Crockett, Davy, 1786-1836
Legislators; Pioneers
